00051 void Rectify_Mesh::apply(void)
00052 {
00053   Cerr << "Rectifying domain " << domaine().le_nom() << finl;
00054 
00055   check_dimension();
00056   check_nb_zones();
00057   check_cell_type();
00058 
00059   if ( Objet_U::dimension == 2 )
00060     {
00061       apply_2D();
00062     }
00063   else
00064     {
00065       apply_3D();
00066     }
00067 
00068   Cerr << "Rectification... OK" << finl;
00069 }
00070 
00071 void Rectify_Mesh::check_dimension(void) const
00072 {
00073   if ( ! ( (Objet_U::dimension == 2) || (Objet_U::dimension == 3) ) )
00074     {
00075       Cerr << "Error in 'Rectify_Mesh::check_dimension()':" << finl;
00076       Cerr << "  Invalid dimension: " << Objet_U::dimension << finl;
00077       Cerr << "  Rectify_Mesh can only deal 2D or 3D domains" << finl;
00078       Process::exit();
00079     }
00080 }
00081 
00082 void Rectify_Mesh::check_nb_zones(void) const
00083 {
00084   if ( domaine().nb_zones() != 1 )
00085     {
00086       Cerr << "Error in 'Rectify_Mesh::check_nb_zones()':" << finl;
00087       Cerr << "  Invalid number of zones: " << domaine().nb_zones() << finl;
00088       Cerr << "  Rectify_Mesh cannot deal with domains having more than one zone" << finl;
00089       Process::exit();
00090     }
00091 }
00092 
00093 void Rectify_Mesh::check_cell_type(void) const
00094 {
00095   const Nom& cell_type = domaine().zone(0).type_elem().valeur().que_suis_je();
00096 
00097   if ( ! ( (cell_type == Motcle("Triangle")) || (cell_type == Motcle("Tetraedre")) ) )
00098     {
00099       Cerr << "Error in 'Rectify_Mesh::check_cell_type()':" << finl;
00100       Cerr << "  Invalid cell type: " << cell_type << finl;
00101       Cerr << "  Rectify_Mesh can only deal with triangles and tetrahedrons" << finl;
00102       Process::exit();
00103     }
00104 }
00105 
00106 void Rectify_Mesh::apply_2D(void)
00107 {
00108   Domaine& domain = domaine();
00109   Scatter::uninit_sequential_domain(domain);
00110 
00111   assert( domain.zone(0).type_elem().valeur().que_suis_je() == Motcle("Triangle") );
00112 
00113   check_cell_orientation_2D();
00114 
00115   Scatter::init_sequential_domain(domain);
00116 }
00117 
00118 
00119 void Rectify_Mesh::apply_3D(void)
00120 {
00121   Domaine& domain = domaine();
00122   Scatter::uninit_sequential_domain(domain);
00123 
00124   assert( domain.zone(0).type_elem().valeur().que_suis_je() == Motcle("Tetraedre") );
00125 
00126   check_cell_orientation_3D();
00127   check_cell_enumeration_3D();
00128 
00129   Scatter::init_sequential_domain(domain);
00130 }
00131 
00132 void Rectify_Mesh::check_cell_orientation_2D(void)
00133 {
00134   const DoubleTab& nodes = domaine().les_sommets();
00135   IntTab&          cells = domaine().zone(0).les_elems();
00136 
00137   const int nb_cells = cells.dimension(0);
00138 
00139   int nb_swaps = 0;
00140 
00141   for (int c=0; c<nb_cells; ++c)
00142     {
00143       const int n0 = cells(c,0);
00144       const int n1 = cells(c,1);
00145       const int n2 = cells(c,2);
00146 
00147       const double x0 = nodes(n0,0);
00148       const double x1 = nodes(n1,0);
00149       const double x2 = nodes(n2,0);
00150 
00151       const double y0 = nodes(n0,1);
00152       const double y1 = nodes(n1,1);
00153       const double y2 = nodes(n2,1);
00154 
00155       const double area = (x1-x0)*(y2-y0) - (x2-x0)*(y1-y0);
00156       if ( area < 0.)
00157         {
00158           swap_nodes(cells,c,1,2);
00159           ++nb_swaps;
00160         }
00161     }
00162 
00163   Cerr << "************************************************" << finl;
00164   Cerr << "Rectify_Mesh::check_cell_orientation_2D report :" << finl;
00165   Cerr << "  " << nb_swaps << " swap" << ((nb_swaps ==1) ? "" : "s") << " were performed" << finl;
00166   Cerr << "************************************************" << finl;
00167 }
00168 
00169 void Rectify_Mesh::check_cell_orientation_3D(void)
00170 {
00171   const DoubleTab& nodes = domaine().les_sommets();
00172   IntTab&          cells = domaine().zone(0).les_elems();
00173 
00174   const int nb_cells = cells.dimension(0);
00175 
00176   int nb_swaps = 0;
00177 
00178   for (int c=0; c<nb_cells; ++c)
00179     {
00180       const int n0 = cells(c,0);
00181       const int n1 = cells(c,1);
00182       const int n2 = cells(c,2);
00183       const int n3 = cells(c,3);
00184 
00185       const double x0 = nodes(n0,0);
00186       const double x1 = nodes(n1,0);
00187       const double x2 = nodes(n2,0);
00188       const double x3 = nodes(n3,0);
00189 
00190       const double y0 = nodes(n0,1);
00191       const double y1 = nodes(n1,1);
00192       const double y2 = nodes(n2,1);
00193       const double y3 = nodes(n3,1);
00194 
00195       const double z0 = nodes(n0,2);
00196       const double z1 = nodes(n1,2);
00197       const double z2 = nodes(n2,2);
00198       const double z3 = nodes(n3,2);
00199 
00200       const double volume =   (x1-x0) * (y2-y0) * (z3-z0)
00201                               + (x2-x0) * (y3-y0) * (z1-z0)
00202                               + (x3-x0) * (y1-y0) * (z2-z0)
00203                               - (z1-z0) * (y2-y0) * (x3-x0)
00204                               - (x2-x0) * (z3-z0) * (y1-y0)
00205                               - (y3-y0) * (x1-x0) * (z2-z0);
00206       if (volume < 0.)
00207         {
00208           swap_nodes(cells,c,2,3);
00209           ++nb_swaps;
00210         }
00211     }
00212 
00213   Cerr << "************************************************" << finl;
00214   Cerr << "Rectify_Mesh::check_cell_orientation_3D report :" << finl;
00215   Cerr << "  " << nb_swaps << " swap" << ((nb_swaps ==1) ? "" : "s") << " were performed" << finl;
00216   Cerr << "************************************************" << finl;
00217 
00218 }
00219 
00220 void Rectify_Mesh::check_cell_enumeration_3D(void)
00221 {
00222   const DoubleTab& nodes = domaine().les_sommets();
00223   IntTab&          cells = domaine().zone(0).les_elems();
00224 
00225   const int nb_cells = cells.dimension(0);
00226 
00227   ArrOfDouble lengths(3);
00228 
00229   int nb_swaps = 0;
00230 
00231   for (int c=0; c<nb_cells; ++c)
00232     {
00233       const int n0 = cells(c,0);
00234       const int n1 = cells(c,1);
00235       const int n2 = cells(c,2);
00236       const int n3 = cells(c,3);
00237 
00238       const double x0 = nodes(n0,0);
00239       const double x1 = nodes(n1,0);
00240       const double x2 = nodes(n2,0);
00241       const double x3 = nodes(n3,0);
00242 
00243       const double y0 = nodes(n0,1);
00244       const double y1 = nodes(n1,1);
00245       const double y2 = nodes(n2,1);
00246       const double y3 = nodes(n3,1);
00247 
00248       const double z0 = nodes(n0,2);
00249       const double z1 = nodes(n1,2);
00250       const double z2 = nodes(n2,2);
00251       const double z3 = nodes(n3,2);
00252 
00253       lengths[0] =   ((x0+x1)-(x2+x3))*((x0+x1)-(x2+x3))
00254                      + ((y0+y1)-(y2+y3))*((y0+y1)-(y2+y3))
00255                      + ((z0+z1)-(z2+z3))*((z0+z1)-(z2+z3));
00256 
00257       lengths[1] =   ((x0+x2)-(x1+x3))*((x0+x2)-(x1+x3))
00258                      + ((y0+y2)-(y1+y3))*((y0+y2)-(y1+y3))
00259                      + ((z0+z2)-(z1+z3))*((z0+z2)-(z1+z3));
00260 
00261       lengths[2] =   ((x0+x3)-(x1+x2))*((x0+x3)-(x1+x2))
00262                      + ((y0+y3)-(y1+y2))*((y0+y3)-(y1+y2))
00263                      + ((z0+z3)-(z1+z2))*((z0+z3)-(z1+z2));
00264 
00265       const int id = imin_array(lengths);
00266 // const int id = imax_array(lengths);
00267 
00268       if ( (id == 0) && (lengths[0] < lengths[1]) )
00269         {
00270           swap_nodes(cells,c,1,2);
00271           swap_nodes(cells,c,1,3);
00272           ++nb_swaps;
00273         }
00274 
00275       if (id == 1)
00276         {
00277 // nothing to do
00278         }
00279 
00280       if ( (id == 2) && (lengths[2] < lengths[1]) )
00281         {
00282           swap_nodes(cells,c,2,3);
00283           swap_nodes(cells,c,1,3);
00284           ++nb_swaps;
00285         }
00286     }
00287 
00288   Cerr << "************************************************" << finl;
00289   Cerr << "Rectify_Mesh::check_cell_enumeration_3D report :" << finl;
00290   Cerr << "  " << nb_swaps << " swap" << ((nb_swaps ==1) ? "" : "s") << " were performed" << finl;
00291   Cerr << "************************************************" << finl;
00292 
00293 }
00294 
00295 void Rectify_Mesh::swap_nodes(IntTab& cells, int cell, int node0, int node1)
00296 {
00297   const int tmp  = cells(cell,node0);
00298   cells(cell,node0) = cells(cell,node1);
00299   cells(cell,node1) = tmp;
00300 }
